questions.question: Have you sent an SSTV transmission?
Have you made an SSTV QSO?

subquestions.question: where you received what looks like a 1990s dorm room poster (complete with ample flesh) via SSTV?
with someone who doesn't understand why they shouldn't be sending 1990s dorm room posters via ham radio?

questions.question: Have you put up an antenna?

subquestions.question: by throwing a heavy object that you didn't properly attach to the line?
and then had to take it back down again to attach the coax because you forgot before you put it up?
that fell down and broke itself?
that fell down and broke something else?

questions.question: Have you attached ham radio gear to something other than a purpose-built ham radio support?

subquestions.question: to an endangered species (flora or fauna)?
to a place of business you worked for?
to a place of business you did not work for?

questions.question: Have you ever attempted to do ham radio from inside a granite (or other mountain) bowl?
Have you ever torn an antenna in half during an activation?
Have you neglected personal care while DXing for multiple hours?

subquestions.question: where the number of hours exceeded the number of contacts you made?

questions.question: Have you ever discussed a prostate on ham radio?
Have you ever heard a QSO on ham radio that would pass the Bechdel Test?
Have you ever used ham radio to discuss dialysis?
Have you seen a vacuum tube?
Have you tuned a vacuum tube transmitter?
Do you own radio gear that weighs more than you do?
Have you ever fat-fingered a frequency so badly you ended up in [Part 90](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Business_band)?
Have you transported yourself more than 10 miles to buy ham radio gear?
Have you ever been inspired to add an antenna to your house while working on an unrelated household chore?

subquestions.question: Did you complete the chore first?
Did you ever complete the chore?

questions.question: Can you remember the difference between a heterodyne and superheterodyne receiver?
